WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Duplicate of http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=3002

Fix will be present in 1.4.5.
WorkItem.Description: PHP_Writer_HTML does not output the last row of the sheet.  If you look in the save method of this class, it is easy to see that the loop that calls _writeRow will not do so on the last row, and there is no call _writeRow after the loop to output the last row.
WorkItem.Summary: PHP_Writer_HTML Does Not Output Last Row
